mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_board (user_id, title, content, category, post_type, create_time, shipping_fee, includes) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{postType}, NOW(), #{shippingFee}, #{includes})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post_board WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM post_board WHERE category = #{category} AND post_type = '공지' ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post_board SET views = views + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
